tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE buildings (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  building_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  energy_consumption DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  last_reading_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ElectricityConsumption (
  consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_id INT REFERENCES Building(building_id),
  month INT NOT NULL,
  year INT NOT NULL,
  consumption_kwh FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CarbonFootprint (
  footprint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_id INT REFERENCES Building(building_id),
  month INT NOT NULL,
  year INT NOT NULL,
  carbon_tons FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE energy_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT,
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    reading_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES energy_meters(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    efficiency_rating FLOAT,
    carbon_footprint FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id)
);
